body: hi,i dont know whats wrong with my brep,can anyone help me?

replies.body:
Hi Kimia, Honey bee cannot read breps (1, 2, 3) correctly, on the picture below: a b c
Try to draw roofs and ground floors of them as single surfaces, so your file works correctly. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/24rKmCGAvAN9hSYNiYm4zJE92*Yg9E9o0yuLKn7A7L5V-kobpBDmnY9yDjgt7fXp3M5A7y2hRQGkkK5WZMGW3yhCCejp3RYC/building__Perspective.png) Bests Antonello

thanks antoni,my problem is that my breps are parametric(drawn in grass not rhino) so i can find better form for total daylight of my building i dont know whats the problem with breps 1-2-3- i made them the same way i did for others:( if i draw it in rhino it wont be parametric form anymore and i cant search for better form:( do you have any idea have can i fix brep 1-2-3- without baking them in rhino

Hi Kimia, Firstly, I'm sorry, the breps are 2, 3 and 4 and not 1, 2, 3 that I wrote yesterday. I suggest that you fix your issue before making your definitive brep, but if it is not possible you can follow the possible method showed below. BEFORE [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Wui*gYiAaOqogskAExr80YAOdSBjWx3*5mO4x7fXvygLCU-83IqacomWO44eV39wcTY*vduowF4DKRkDh7AXzes95VOibWdY/ERROR.png) AFTER [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Wui*gYiAaOoM0M8wPEXkBHpV7ikgBe3fQP9l6XkudopdQBr4-wyQFCSwSJ*NBlpQec4lj*tG*wgA35sp-*FcqasOQ3y-7VNC/fix.png) Bests Antonello
